executiveSummary: Andy Burke and his brother Eric presented their company, Bertello, seeking $120,000 for 10% equity for their multi-fuel outdoor pizza oven on Shark Tank. After demonstrating the product and receiving interest from multiple sharks, they ultimately accepted Kevin O’Leary’s offer of $120,000 for 25% equity over Barbara Corcoran’s similar offer.
keyDecisions: The founders chose to accept Kevin O’Leary’s offer of $120,000 for 25% equity.
nextSteps: Andy and Eric will partner with Kevin O’Leary to scale Bertello’s sales, optimize marketing, and expand distribution channels, particularly in retail and digital markets.
